ahhh overwatch. ever since they put a 2 on the end this game hasnt been fun. $20-$40 skins. the even put a price tag on OLDER skins that you used to be able to unlock free or through loot boxes. ahhhhh loot boxes. everyone misses the loot boxes!  battlepass rewards are trash. you dont get currency through the battlepass like you would EVERY OTHER GAME. and the currency they do give you through weekly missions wont even buy you that one really cool skin you want OR THE NEXT BATTLE PASS. Diablo Immortal all over again. this game may be fun at times but progression seems dull and non existent. i LOVE OVERWATCH and it saddens me to see what has happened to this game. BUT IF YOU HAVE NEVER PLAYED OVERWATCH AND NEVER PAID FOR IT you shouldtry it out. just beware of the prices of these skins. good luck everyone!

This game is a sorry excuse for a sequel. In reality its another predatory "free to play model" shooter game that shits on any of the quality of life that the first game had since you did actually have to pay for that one. After around 3 or 4 years in development and leaving the first game dead in the water, blizzard has failed to deliver on basically every promise they made, and any of the campaign content they are releasing now have been severely gutted from the original gameplay footage shown off. No more skill trees, no more hundreds of missions, no more Jeff. 

I supported and played this game nearly every day for around 7 to 8 months after its release and now I realize how much of a moron I was for doing so. There were times when I was genuinely excited for the next updates, and maybe getting to play that PvE content that was promised one day, but now its very clear that we were all played for fools for a quick buck. Do not support this terrible excuse of a competitive shooter, since its clear there was never any intentions of delivering on what was promised to the community. go play tf2 or even fuckin paladins man, just don't play this.

I originally planned to write a serious review, but then I remembered that this is not Overwatch 1 so Iâ€™m not going to waste your time like Blizzard

The balance is just a shitty rock-paper-scissors. You take team comp A, if you start winning enemy team swaps to team comp B which hard counters you, and now your best option is to swap to team comp C to hard-counter them, and pretty much the whole game can go like this. It doesn't matter how good you are at your hero, overwhelming majority of heroes have a hard-counter picks, against which they become pretty much troll-picks and you are forced to switch.

They also went with the greediest f2p model imaginable, skins are ridiculously expensive, even new heroes are paywalled or locked behind massive grind.
